title: Dream11 | SDE2 | Mumbai
content:
Education: Btech from tier 2
Years of Experience: ~3.5 years
Prior Experience: product based MNC
prev comp: ~45L 
Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
Company: Dream11
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Mumbai
Salary: 55L
Relocation: will sponsor movement of goods + 1 way flight to mumbai + 14 days stay at hotel
Signing Bonus: 11L (2 year full clawback)
Stock bonus: ~22L for 4 years (10, 20, 30, 40)
Yearly Bonus: nil
Benefits: 50% rent payment 
Other details: it's 4 days/week work from office.

Interview expereince: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/6388322/Dream11-or-SDE2-or-Mumbai-or-Dec-2024-Offer

title: Phonepe | Software Engineer | Pune
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 5
Prior Experience: SDE2 at Deliveroo
Current Compensation(Salary + Bonus): 52,00,000 
Date of the Offer: 6 Feb 2025
Company: Phonepe
Title/Level: Software Engineer(Flat Heirarchy)
Location: Pune
Salary: 48,00,000
Signing Bonus: 5,00,000 in first year. 5,00,000 in second year
Stock bonus: 45,00,000 ESOPS over 4 years
Bonus: N/A
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~64,00,000 for first 2 years
Benefits: Standard Phonepe Benefits
Other details: Tried negotiating on Base and ESOPS but they said this is the highest they can offer in Pune location.
